website_summaries.verdict: One of the only true sleeping futons that folds upright into a laid-back chair. Plenty of comfort in either position.
pros: Extra length supports the feet with the thick fabric and foam
Size when laid out is longer than a typical bed
cons: Doesn’t provide a complete seated position option

customer_reviews.title: The manufacturer does NOT back up the warranty!
customer_reviews.text: Had the futon for a little over a month as seating in my living room. Had a guest five weeks after purchase, they slept on the futon for two days. On the second day, the futon would not return to the seating position but stayed flat. I called the manufacturer who told me that since I didn't have the paperwork that came with it, they could not open a claim and I was stuck with the defective futon. She was very rude and said although sold through Amazon they don't keep those records! BUYER BEWARE!!
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Superb qualtiy.
customer_reviews.text: Wow !!! This was beyond my expectation. I must say i was hesitant to buy furniture off of amazon as this was my first time doing so. But i was not dissappointed. The shipping was fast. It was very easy to assemble. My husband did it by himself. I loveeed the color and the velvety touch to it. It’s firm but super comfy. It doesn’t take up that much space. Loved the quality !! It fits in a relatively small space perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Zara

customer_reviews.title: You get what you paid for
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a while ago, for my guest room. The only person that stays over is my best friend, and she sleeps over once or twice a month. After 3 months and maybe 5 times of actually using the couch, the spring in the middle part of the couch stopped working. Literally got worn out and left a huge dent in the middle. And let me not even start on the stains, it is soooo easy to get messy. Also fyi, my friend weights roughly 120, so there is no reasonable explanation as to why it got dent so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Duque

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: Firm but still comfy, super cute I'm in love with it! Packaging was kinda banged up so I was nervous including a pretty big cut on the box. But everything was packed safely and it's on pristine condition! It looks great and I love the Velcro strips on the bottom so you can keep them together more securely. It does get dirty easily so if you're messy or have small children I would suggest the black, but from what I've noticed you just have to wipe it with a baby wipe it's super easy to clean and put together. I'm 5'1 and I put them both together in under 20 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful item. Sadly the top of the ottoman was ...
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful item. Sadly the top of the ottoman was noticeably off and the screws on the back left was uneven and kept coming undone even after I tighten them. With a simple movement the top kept popping up as well. I had to take the rod off and when the top fell back, I was able to re-drill new holes that where even with the other side and once I did that I placed the rod back on and it's perfect now. If the workers putting these together can put some love into their job this will be a perfect item, and I would of totally put 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Leivas

customer_reviews.title: Nice color and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Came earlier than expected. Nice color and comfy. Easy to assemble the parts. Took me roughly 8-10 minutes. Would have given 5 stars if the screws were a better. When you tighten the small screws that goes in the middle, it doesnot tighten up (but it's not a problem) but would still be firm. Bank for the buck. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Zee

customer_reviews.title: within 6-7 month it's got down in middle part. ...
customer_reviews.text: within 6-7 month it's got down in middle part. Was expecting it to not have these kind of issues so early.
customer_reviews.author: vaibhav bajpai

customer_reviews.title: The black catches dust easily so it looks dirty pretty quick
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this online because I wasn’t able to see or feel the quality and I was right. The quality is cheaper than I expected. The black catches dust easily so it looks dirty pretty quick. Assembly should have been easy but even with the screwed in legs it was a struggle because of the alignment.
customer_reviews.author: hello

customer_reviews.title: Not bad product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble except for one of the legs, seemed stripped, applied a little more pressure to push it in to fit! The click to adjust the height of the back of “couch” was a bit tricky, but once you figure it out, you kinda feel like you aloof! LOL Only other complaint is if you lay to far on one end you will tip it and fall. Otherwise pretty good for small spaces, and great back support.
customer_reviews.author: leah Threats

customer_reviews.title: I'm 5'10" and weight 170 lb It's pretty short also
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what is made out of but I can no longer use it since 75% of the sitting area lost it's cushion support now my butt just sinks all the way to the bottom. I'm 5'10" and weight 170 lb It's pretty short also, you won't be able to lay down on it without having your feet sticking out if you are taller than 5'7"
customer_reviews.author: Tae K.

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up, the instructions were clear and even included a support line. This product fits me well to relax and sleep on ( I am 5,11 ) but I would not recommend it for anyone taller than that. It is a sturdy surface and it can seem kind of hard to those who prefer mattresses. It also arrived 2 days before the earliest date provided.
customer_reviews.author: ivo

customer_reviews.title: Great chaise
customer_reviews.text: Looks wonderful in my small bedroom and was easy to install. No chemical odor of any kind, which is pleasant. The only reason I gave it 4 instead of 5 stars is because it's very, very firm. It's springy if I bounce on it but I wouldn't plop down on this like I would on a comfy couch. Very glad with the purchase otherwise. Please be aware that this comes in a big, heavy, and awkward box. I'm a petite girl and carrying this up 3 flights of stairs was a full body workout and then some...
customer_reviews.author: amythepuff

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, but Short
customer_reviews.text: This. Was. GREAT! I had hip surgery in August and this was delivered to my first floor where I used this exclusively for 4 weeks straight since I was unable to walk. It's very comfortable and the positioning of the head was great. I can sit up during the day and lay it flat during the night. I do wish, though, that it was a bit longer (I am 5' 10" and my feet dangled a bit). Overall it was pretty great to have.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew GastonTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Very low quality piece
customer_reviews.text: Many of the reviews are for other products. I got the ottoman. The hinge is a big silver eyesore. I may take it off and paint it to blend in better. The feet are also a cheap plastic. I will need to replace them at some point. The hinges are loose and it makes the top sit crookedly - not aligned. There is also something loose and hidden inside the lining of the top section that makes a noise when you lift the top, maybe it’s a silica gel packet. Can’t get it out without ripping off the lining. Not sure whether I want to keep this or pay return shipping for a better quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Winters

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: We got tired of feet up on the coffee table so we put a tray on top and are using this ottoman as a coffee table in front of the sofa. The Grey Linen color is beautiful and I'm impressed with the quality. Now everyone is happy with an ottoman, a "table," storage and it's a great extra seat too. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Received damaged (Update: Replaced)
customer_reviews.text: This futon is just as good, if not better than most of it's kind and at a much lower price. The only bad thing is its packaging, it's just a thin box, and if it gets damaged during shipping it damages the futon itself. Like mine did. It would be 5 stars if no damage. It's very firm, but comfortable, and looks decent. Reached out to amazon about the damage. They quickly sent a replacement (2 days), scheduled a pick-up (next-day) after I received the new one. After having it a few days, I can say it's well worth the price. But you get what you pay for, it does get quite uncomfortable after a long movie, for example.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando A.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: The delivery came a week earlier than waa expected. The out of the box to fully assembled expect was a breeze. The fabric seems sturdy enough aa does the frame. While the foam filling feels dense on the initial inspection this changes after sitting/laying on it for a while. I don't know how long it will hold up. The unit looks great in my study; perfect size and color (matches my Oriental rug). I have no complaints for the money. Now for the million dollar question; "Would I buy it again?" My honest answer is I don't know. It depends on how long this sofa/futon/thing holds up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Rick S.

customer_reviews.title: DHP Sectional Futon Sofa and Lounger
customer_reviews.text: This product was exactly as described. For the cost it was well worth it. I have 4 children and 3 great danes and I needed furniture for our living room. This works perfect and it also works as extra room to have guests sleep if needed. It is put together well although the underneath is cheap easy to rip liner but I don't care you don't see it. The fact that they can rest at different levels is also an added bonus. Easy to put together in about 15 minutes. I have allen wrenched with long stems and handles which make it way easier to put together then their tool. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B.

customer_reviews.title: What a Stylish Piece and a bargain price - White Chaise Lounge
customer_reviews.text: I looked at many styles and models on many sites. I listed my needs and wants to zoom in on THE RIGHT choice. This Chaise Lounge was so easy to assemble in 5 min. No damage in shipping. I needed firm support for my neck and back when sitting up which this provides. The metal legs have plastic tips which was necessary as we have ceramic tile floors. All that and a clean, modern styling for my design studio. Can you tell I love it?
customer_reviews.author: online shopper

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value for money. Prompt shipping.
customer_reviews.text: At this price it’s a steal! While this is not something I would add to a living room, for student dorms, dens and sunrooms, it’s perfect. It’s quite a firm seat. I’m not sure how long the fabric would last, but I have thrown a very large sheepskin over it which solves both issues. Assembly is very easy. It’s mostly fully assembled pre-shipping so just the legs need to be attached. Stowing the legs and hardware under the chaise in a zippered compartment is a great idea. Shipping was very prompt. The package arrived early!
customer_reviews.author: al tishal otiTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design
customer_reviews.text: I mostly am very happy with this chaise. The design is great, and I also love that it's good for small spaces but it's still very comfortable and feels spacious. The reason I'm giving 4 stars instead of 5 is because there's a strong chemical smell that hasn't gone away after about a week. It's not unbearable, but it's still there and I can smell it when I'm sitting on the couch. I'm hoping it eventually goes aways.
customer_reviews.author: Love

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful futon!
customer_reviews.text: This futon is beautiful! It was super easy to put together as well. It does make some noise if I push on it with my hands, but otherwise I don't notice anything. The color is gorgeous & the material is very soft. I don't like the back, but luckily I had a blanket in the same color to hang over it. It is firm & I actually like that when I lay down on it for my back. The silver legs make it look sleek and a little more "expensive". I'm super happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: rosexduskTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For My Small Space
customer_reviews.text: I hustled this puppy up 3 flights of stairs (solo) and the assembly was easier. It came with all the necessary tools to put it together. I searched multiple local furniture stores to try and find anything remotely close to this, all the while this item sat in my Amazon cart for nearly a month. Similar items I found were double or more in price and nothing came close in comparison to the dimensions, style and budget. This futon is everything I wanted it to be and more. Excellent quality and super soft to the touch. It is convenient for smaller areas for sure. It is a futon so don't expect to sink into a cushiony type of material.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t reflect the pictures
customer_reviews.text: I bought this couch as I thought I could use it as bed too (sometimes). The couch is very uncomfortable. Also the color isn’t the same as shown in the pictures. It wasn’t a good purchase so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Trina94

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size and Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: We just received our futon and it looks great! After reviewing some of the other reviews, I made sure to do a full inspection to check for any bugs or unwanted insects. We found nothing! The quality is nice. My teenage son actually installed it which means it's an easy do. It's a bit firm but we can get a topper to soften it up. I was expecting it to be larger but its actually a perfect size for our space. We have a full.size couch and an oversized chair and the futon fits perfectly in the open space. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Oshun Waters

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this. It is terrible.
customer_reviews.text: After owning this for less than 4 months the springs have all gone out and the sofa is the most uncomfortable couch I have ever sat on. Fresh out of the box it was very hard and squeaky. I was hoping it would soften up, but instead the seats have dented in gotten harder and the metal frame is all you can sit on now. 3 months. Worst purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AKStevenson

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: It looks great, fits my small space, but God help you if you need to sleep on this for more than a couple of nights. This thing is so uncomfortable to sleep on, I was a bit shocked. The cushions are firm but there are metal hinges down the center that feel like they are trying to push through your back. I like a firm mattress but I think sleeping on gravel might be more comfortable. If you plan to use it as a couch it works fine but if you need to sleep on it for more than a couple of days LOOK ELSEWHERE.
customer_reviews.author: quintin

customer_reviews.title: Does not last long
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend the product as the pleather is very thin. The issue with us was that the legs welding broke and now unusable. Legs are very thin wall metal with welding to hold the bolt in to screw the legs.
customer_reviews.author: N My

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for TV Room
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for the money. This lounge is perfect for a TV or Recreation room. The padding is extra firm. Very easy to put together. I am 5'6". My feet hang off the edge when in the reclined position, but I don't mind that. It makes for a great extra bed source if you need it. I like it because it's not messy like futons tend to look It's conformable and stylish. Super fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Davies

customer_reviews.title: Worth It
customer_reviews.text: I was able to assemble this myself in a little under an hour with no tools; I could not believe it. I’m 23, and I’ve never built anything before this (haha). It’s surprisingly very comfortable, and it looks pretty high end. Material is very soft. It’s a little smaller than I had anticipated, but it definitely works. 10 out 10, would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Carissa D.

customer_reviews.title: Really like this bench!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for unconventional use - have large older dogs that can't make the jump on the bed anymore, so thought this would help (especially since good dog steps are extremely costly & not proportioned well for large dogs). For standard ottoman purposes, this is a great, well made product, it's attractive, and the price is very fair for it's intended use! The storage section is pretty roomy. The top cushion part is very firm, so keep that in mind if you're looking for a more cushioney, flexible seat.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Poor Construction
customer_reviews.text: After less than a week of daily use, a cross bar has broken in the seating area pf the chaise lounger. The building materials are apparently shoddy. Buyer beware. It seems to be hit or miss as to whether you will get a good one or a lemon. However, I did not have the issues others have had with putting the feet on. Those are solid on mine.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie B

customer_reviews.title: DHP - Please work on your Quality Controls
customer_reviews.text: I returned this after reading the inconsistent reviews and I’m glad I did. When I received this the box was damaged and couch was exposed in some areas where the box had holes in it. DHP really needs to get their arms around their quality before allowing these products to leave their warehouse.
customer_reviews.author: 303isWhereiBe

customer_reviews.title: nice futon
customer_reviews.text: It has a nice feel to it. Much heavier that I thought it would be. Easy to assemble but needed a friends help to turn it over once assembled. It is not stable as a bed, flips over if you sit on the wrong side. You will need pillows to use it as a couch, luckily I have lots of pillows so it worked out. Back of couch has a ledge that sticks out. It holds the bed when flattened out. Better if placed against a wall vs. out in the open.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly A. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Storage Ottoman
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these ottomans. Nice and solid constuction. All I had to do was put the feet on. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: cece203

customer_reviews.title: Not much pad
customer_reviews.text: This couch is super sexy and modular, but you can feel the inner springs every time you sit on it. For reference I weigh 170lbs. Excellent for a short sit in the seated position but lacks comfort when trying to lounge or layout. Folds into a full bed area but you will feel every board and metal support in it while laying on it. Very noisy clunks when changing the seat positions. I add a mattress topper to it when laying it down and that works well.
customer_reviews.author: dustin stephan

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: My son picked this for a convertible living room/bedroom situation. It's great for the price, looks nice and was very easy to assemble. Sleeping on it regularly might be a little uncomfortable because the faux leather makes a lot of squeaky noises. All in all, it was a steal for the price though and we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Could not be more pleased!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived today. Packaged extremely well, and even wrapped in a protective cloth cover in the box. It exceeds my expectations, with a hydraulic system that will not allow the top to fall down on little fingers. Perfect size to hold my knitting projects, and just right for my small sitting room.
customer_reviews.author: CST

customer_reviews.title: Save your back and your money
customer_reviews.text: We got this in May and it is now August, so we have had it 3 months. When it first came it was so easy to put together and it was so beautiful in our office. However 3 months later with very little use it is already falling apart (see attached pictures). Also with the 2 different guests we have had spend the night on it. Both of them preferred to sleep on our carpeted floor. Save your money and buy something that won't hurt your backside.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like this couch SO BAD
customer_reviews.text: *I wasn't paid for this and I didn't receive a discount for my opinion* I wanted to like this so badly but it squeaks like a dog toy but lower pitched. It looks alright, just some wrinkles around the seams, but I can't get over the sound and how insanely uncomfortable it is! I am 5'2" and 114lbs so I don't feel like I'm breaking it or stressing to much and I'm not doing anything vigorous so.... it's just the way the couch is. It didn't take too long to put together and it was simple but if I had the chance I would save the money I spent on this couch and put it towards a higher quality one.
customer_reviews.author: Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Sagged after three months and very hard on the rear after sitting for more than an hour.
customer_reviews.text: Within three months it began to sagg where your rear end sits. Also very hard, not soft at all. They should put a memory foam of some sort to make it more comfortable to lounge on.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Lover

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not too comfortable
customer_reviews.text: So I take care of my belongings & I kept this looking neat brand new for over 1 1/2 years covering it & preventing the dog from getting on it. Made the boyfriend shower 1st (lol- he was in construction.) however, it tore in the center & bar poked through. Very uncomfortable especially for the person laying on the right (backside). It looked really nice & fairly comfortable if you sat in it. Once you lie it flat to lay down... prepare for backache. You could feel the bar poking thru your back.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Just assembled it and it seems decent quality. It’s more comfy than i expected being a cheap piece of furniture. I still wouldn’t use it as a futon or couch but it looks great in my master bedroom sitting area. It is down lower than I anticipated but it gives a nice modern feel to go with my mid century modern + bohemian style we have going on . I only wish the legs came in different finish options. I might have to spray paint them as diff color to match other pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Nerissa

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price but not very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: The build quality of this futon is okay, sturdy and has that premium look however it falls short in the comfort category you can't sit for long time due the lack of enough cushion especially at the sitting area the back is okay but it could've been a bit longer to support the neck... The mechanism seem to operate decently that being said for the price it's okay... I could've given it a solid 4 out 5 stars if they had worked on sitting cushion more because it would've given us a lot more comfort. 3 stars is a fair score for this one.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Really nice looking surprisingly useful in my retirement apartment
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these when I moved into a small retirement apartment so I would have sleep places for company for which they are excellent. When I don't have company I use them for exercising, napping, folding clothes and sleeping the whole night when the softer bed just isn't working for me. I can move them easily on the tile floors.
customer_reviews.author: D. J. Archer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bang for Your Buck
customer_reviews.text: I was honestly, pleasantly surprised at how nice this futon is. We converted a bay in the garage to a game room/guest room and this is perfect. It's a little hard but to me that also means it's going to last. I probably wouldn't like it as much if it were the sofa I was to curl up on to watch tv every night, but then again I'm the one that likes 5 pillows at night, so I like fluffy. I would definitely buy it for a smaller space or a guestroom/office.
customer_reviews.author: Lori L.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and classy futon
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and classy futon. I was worried that it would look cheap or cheesy but it looks great. So far I haven't had any issues with it sinking or staining. When it folds down it's about the size of a twin. Would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: AWashin8

customer_reviews.title: Was ripped on the inside, but too much of a pain to return
customer_reviews.text: The chair itself is what you'd expect for cheap furniture. It probably won't last long, but in our case it's almost decorative and it serves its purpose. During assembly you need to unzip the bottom to access the legs and screws. When I unzipped it there was a giant hole in the pouch which lead to essentially the inside of the couch. Had to navigate around exposed nails to find all of the parts inside the couch, and a pack of beads (like a preservative) exploded in there so it's noisy when it moves. You get what you pay for, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: If you like your furniture stiff then you’ll love this! I’ve slept a whole night on this whenever my allergies act up and it was a life saver. No signs of wear (I’ve had it for several months now) and I couldn’t be more pleased. It was easy to assemble - just required the legs to be screwed on! Has minor creasing on the sides but it doesn’t bother me or take away from the appeal of the chaise.
customer_reviews.author: xsarai

customer_reviews.title: Decent but terrible sleep
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and not bad comfort wise, I have to get used to no arms on the side though and to lay down to watch tv is pretty low to the ground other than that satisfied Update: I slept on this last night because my new mattress for my bed needs 48 hrs to expand. Tossed and turned all night my back killed me today dropping it down 3 stars because you can still sit on it but I would recommend a topper or something if u want someone to sleep on this...
customer_reviews.author: Edgar VanTassel jr.

customer_reviews.title: Not comfy
customer_reviews.text: Price is affordable but this in not comfy as a bed. The work on the backside of the unit is poorly done/rushed. This is a late review post. I bought this in Jan 2020 for home use.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: I am in love!
customer_reviews.text: Newly single with an entire house to furnish I decided I was going ultra femme. I am so sick of oversized leather couches and dark wood finishes I could scream, anyway... My living room is tiny so I started looking at loveseats then I saw this futon and I immediately fell in love. I fell even deeper when it arrived. The color is exquisite, and the fabric is as soft as a puppy’s ear. The design is brilliant and super easy to assemble. I couldn’t be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sfnyny

customer_reviews.title: If you understand that it's a good size for one person
customer_reviews.text: very firm, honestly I thought it would be bigger than I thought, somethign for two people to be able to lay down on and sleep if I have some guests over. If you understand that it's a good size for one person, and it's quite firm then you will like it a lot. I personally am ok with it because I like my bed firm (I rather sleep on a hardwood floor than something that is too soft). Maybe one day I'll get the accompanying lounge chaise to make the futon bigger when I open it up.
customer_reviews.author: MJ Woo

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, muli-functional, great value
customer_reviews.text: This futon is excellent! Best bang for the buck. Keeping in mind this is not a top of the line futon or legitimate sofa, for what you pay is a bargain. My kid uses it for a bed more than his actual nice bed (that I literally paid 10x the amount for). It looks great in our den, that we use part time for gaming. To be real, I'm 200lb guy that can sit for an hour or so comfortably before having to move/reposition. Love it though. Color, fabric, quality, very good. Best buy for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Omar Feliciano

customer_reviews.title: If you want to use this as just a means to fill space then you're good to go but if you actually want to sit ...
customer_reviews.text: The most uncomfortable back hurting couch I've ever sat on. If you sit on it for more than 30 minutes your back will hurt for more than an hour. If you want to use this as just a means to fill space then you're good to go but if you actually want to sit or lay on it I would highly recommend against it.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Moellering

customer_reviews.title: Very Functional, Beautiful Velvet Futon. Painful to lie down on.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this lovely Velvet Futon Love seat/Couch and I am mostly happy after a year of ownership There are metal wheels in the center of the futon when you lie it down and they are TOO hard to lay on, so you have to lie down on onside or the other, not the middle. Also if you lay down on the back part with it fully laid out, you are liable to tip over. It arrived in PERFECT condition and was easy to assemble once I read the instructions and was able to put together on my own (Strong Man). Good love seat but hate that metal wheels in center of the couch when its fully laid out.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Great for a college dorm room!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sofa so much! I ordered it for my college dorm room, and all my friends use it to chill in. Plus, they like to stay the night and sleep on it. It is pretty confortable, easy to put together, and looks nice. Overall, it is a great buy. I would get it again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but poor construction
customer_reviews.text: I like that this product looks modern and sleek. It fits perfectly in my office. I dislike however how shoddy and cheap it's assembly components are. The bottom of this chairs brackets that you mount the legs to are uneven and the screws aren't all the way in. You screw only 3 bolts into a bracket that requires 4. The screw holes made are not done well so it's kind of tricky to maneuver them in. It was a quick assembly however I'll give it that. I knew it wouldn't be that comfortable but it honestly won't be used for sleeping anyway. Overall I'd give the build quality 2.5/5.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron W.

customer_reviews.title: It is nice to have this futon
customer_reviews.text: It is nice to have this futon. Though it looks elegant but it has it's own flaws. Build quality is not supreme which causes discomfort on long time use. Cushioning is also somewhat comes under scanner as you can feel the legs hardness on certain angles. Futon scores points on it's look. Definitely it is a good looking piece which can enhance rooms look under certain conditions (ambiance, wall color etc). May be on this price it is decent buy but would not recommend it for regular use. It could cause some problem if it's used extensively. Overall at this cost range could be an OK buy but could not compliment a comfortable sofa
customer_reviews.author: amardeep

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable, cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Super uncomfortable. You can feel every board and spring in the seat. When opened it is uneven to lay on. The back wont click into place correctly and seems to lean back to one side more. Have to have it up against the wall to sit up. I guess you get what you pay for. If the box wasnt so hard to open causing me to rip it apart, I would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small space
customer_reviews.text: Very firm and a little difficult to put together if you are alone but glad I picked this one. Its a great size for my small space and it feels very sturdy. Weight limit is 600lbs. Excellent choice for the price! Edit: after having this for almost 2 weeks I am still very happy! Its not too firm, very very comfortable. Love the reclining option and it's the perfect size for my dog and me to share! I bought a regular futon cover (no arms) to protect it and even that fits well. Its a great fit and look in my room and I dont think I could have picked something better for the size and price.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but mildew smell is unbearable
customer_reviews.text: For futon, it is more comfortable than we expected. I do have pillows lining it for extra comfort. We ordered the Futon with the chaise. The entire review would be great but the chaise smells like mold so bad that my entire house stinks of mildew which is too bad, I've been trying everything to mask the smell but its overwhelming when you enter my house. I dont think everyone will deal with this problem cause I haven't seen any reviews on this god awful smell, I think the box stored in it must of gotten wet.
customer_reviews.author: RCG525

customer_reviews.title: Super Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: super uncomfortable but it looks cool. I wouldn't want to sit / lay on it for long. Read the dimensions before buying, kind of short.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Maybe buy this for a space where nobody will ever sit for long. It’s juts not comfortable. It looks good but on set up you can tell it’s cheaply made. Or... I guess If you want to break a tv habit buy this couch. You will not want to sit for long! I watched a theee hour movie the other day and had to get up to take a break - no way this thing will last very long either.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Actually Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Every asks where I get these. The futon is not cheaply made at all and is very durable for the price. We thought we would be lucky to get a year out of the product, but so far no wear and tear 11 months later. Very comfortable too.
customer_reviews.author: Waylon Fisher

customer_reviews.title: the couch is very firm not comfortable to sleep on aesthetically looks great easy to put ...
customer_reviews.text: The color came a little different than expected I am going to order more when I have the funds, the couch is very firm not comfortable to sleep on aesthetically looks great easy to put together folds Down Easy, cleans very easily I do love this sofa , I will be ordering two more for my other living room so I can have a set at 3 to fill the room, they feel more like a chair than actual comfortable sofa it's more like a chair, but for me it works
customer_reviews.author: angela

customer_reviews.title: Functional and looks great
customer_reviews.text: I bought the lounge and futon together. They were both very easy to put together. I did both alone and took me less than 15 minutes. The seats are firm, but not too hard. I have a small living room and these fit very nicely. They are not real high off the ground, but I am 5'4 and my son is 5'7 and we both sit comfortable on it. My 7 year old and 2 of her friends have slept comfortably on them as well. I'm really happy with my purchase. If you have a small space and are looking for something that is functional and looks great, don't hesitate to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Modern, attractive , firm but comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love this sofa! It was so well packaged it was hard to get the sections out. Super easy to assemble. Looks great. It is firm but not uncomfortable. If you are used to super plush sofas don’t get this you won’t like it. Works great as a futon provided you aren’t too tall. My room is a 10x10 and it fit just so with a little table in between. Material is tough, my shih Tzu likes to scratch and the fabric is just fine. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Anomalous

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this.
customer_reviews.text: This product is a total waste of money. It just gives a so called good feeling for 1 week. After that its starts hurting your body when ever you sit, you hit the metal rod. The springs are poor quality. now we cant use this any more as sofa as the spring stopped working. Very bad quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Boo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: We love this ottoman. Purchased it to store my daughters toys in the living room. It fits a good amount of stuff and is easy for an almost two year old to open and shut by herself. Is has a hydraulic arms in it that keeps it from falling on her head. She also climbs up and lays down on it daily and it still looks great. The fabric is nice, I feel like it looks more expensive than it was. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Joke
customer_reviews.text: Ok like honestly this was just a complete joke I always buy things in amazon like coffee tables, tv stands and bed sets and it always comes out 100% completely satisfied with it but this is just hard as a rock and can tell it’s vev cheaply made me and my wife rather sit on the floor then on this!! I just ended up buying a sectional in Ashley furniture you pay for what you get
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Also good as a massage table when all the way down
customer_reviews.text: My fiancee put this in the second position and accidentally slept on it a whole night because it's just that dang comfy. Also good as a massage table when all the way down. I have a fused spine and I use this for stretching and reading all the time. Assembly was literally just putting the legs on.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie K

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous color pink and looks more expensive then was.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous for the price... so easy putting it together. My only complaint was how difficult it was to get out of the box. I plan on purchasing another for my college age daughter who needs furniture for her apartment. Comfort level is decent for a futon and for younger people who are looking for a reasonable priced piece of furniture that’s functional. Ordered pillows for it.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but not comfortable for sleeping
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Comfortable for 2 people to sit, more than that the bars become uncomfortable. Sleeping is impossible without a ground level air mattress on it. The bars hit the hip and back . Because of the slant of the back when in seating position you need a pillow for support. Overall it’s a price best for limited use and can help discourage gets from staying longer than a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Annacat

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but is missing Velcro to attach both pieces
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. It was easy to assemble, looks great, easy to clean, & fairly comfortable. Just what I needed/expected, especially for the affordable price. My only issue is, it didn’t come with Velcro to attach the couch to the lounger as stated in the instructions. It was supposed to be attached to both pieces but is nonexistent. Thus why 4 out of 5 stars. Would be 5 otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Elsis

customer_reviews.title: Great product  !
customer_reviews.text: This product looks amazing, it was a breeze to assemble, and it was very inexpensive ! It looks and feels as good as furniture we paid MUCH more for. With two rambunctious boys, and a busy household, this futon and chaise combination is an excellent value! I have to wonder about the validity of the poor reviews, because it really is an excellent piece of furniture !
customer_reviews.author: Doug Johns

customer_reviews.title: Please do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I have edited this review after my 1 year of purchase. This product is definitely not worth to buy for this price. With normal usage itself the futon sofa is fully gone. Initially I was happy with the purchase but after few months I understood the mistake in buying this cheap product. The sofa is now became unfit to sit or sleep with many ups and downs. People willing to waste money can definitely buy this futon sofa and regret later.
customer_reviews.author: Chandramathan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy workhorse but UNCOMFORTABLE.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful to look at but it is extremely uncomfortable to sit on for long periods of time. It's sturdy and has held about 550lbs collective weight on it. Not comfortable to sleep on. If you want a sofa that looks good for an office or something where you probably wont sit for more than 15 minutes or so, then yeah ok you shluls get this. It's aesthetically please but not much else.
customer_reviews.author: Sara B.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap with a hole
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble but the couch has a hole in it already. Right in the front too so it's noticeable and it's on the seat so in a high traffic spot. It feels like you are sitting on cardboard...very stiff but in a cheap way...like if you press too hard you will leave an impression in the surface. Color is nice and it looks nice but I'm very disappointed in the hole.
customer_reviews.author: Justpeachy85

customer_reviews.title: Remember the price.
customer_reviews.text: As others have said. This piece (futon) is wonderful. Mostly in look. For sleeping one would need to be broke, have a disregard for their guests, or get a memory foam topper. The topper makes it amazing! Mine is a costco 3".
customer_reviews.author: KTS

customer_reviews.title: Small Spaces and Small People
customer_reviews.text: This wasn't too bad to sit on, but there's a bar right in the middle of where your back would be, which makes it super uncomfortable. This is also a much shorter item than we expected, even though we knew the dimensions. It just seems small. Even our kids who could fit on it don't want to use it because it is so uncomfortable. Would definitely not recommend this item unless you had 2-5 year olds who needed a space for 1-2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for mom and she's very happy with it as she loves how easy it is for her to set the different back rest angles without having to ask me for help as with other beds she's had before. the bed is a bit low so go her 3 inch bed raisers and a narrow twin 3 inch memory foam that folds in three parts and it is prefect. Not sure about the durability or strength of the legs.
customer_reviews.author: Iki

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, but...
customer_reviews.text: When I pulled it out of the box, I noticed that there were some wood chips in the bottom. It appears that the couch was screwed together loosely for shipment, and the screws broke the wood that holds them together. I really didn't want to try and send it back and get a new one, because I needed it ASAP, so I ended up going to home depot, buying some plywood to put over the broken board. I used 2 pieces and it worked quite well - I don't know that anyone would notice if they didn't know about it. It just kinda sucked to have to do. An extra $30 for a mostly okay couch. :P
customer_reviews.author: Crystal C.

customer_reviews.title: Loved it at first.  One year later, definitely not
customer_reviews.text: At first I liked this. It was affordable and looked pretty good. It was easy to assemble, had it finished in minutes. But over time I started liking it less and less. You can feel the bands they use to hold the "cushions" in place when you sit or lay on it. Even worse, as you can see, it has completely started collapsing in the middle and there's no way to fix it. So now I have a sofa that looks like crud after one year and will have to go get something else.
customer_reviews.author: A. Saar

customer_reviews.title: This thing is unbelievable!!!
customer_reviews.text: We cannot believe this is so cheap! It is amazing quality! The fabric is beautifully done and the legs screw on and are sturdy. My daughter sits in it to do her homework and then we lay the back rest down when friends sleep over and it is a guest bed in her room! We bought one of those little tables usually for couches that you pull over the couch. With this chaise, she can pull it over her legs while sitting and it is like a desk so fantastic homework spot. Just love it!
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Love  it
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I love the sleekness of the look and I find it comfortable. I live in a studio apartment so it doubles as my bed. I do use a 3 inch memory foam topper on it for when I turn into bed, store it behind the couch/chaise each morning, and it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Swortfiguer

Hopefully I will hear from the company. I will update this if I do.

customer_reviews.author: seok lee

customer_reviews.title: Easy and quick
customer_reviews.text: 20-minute assembly with one person! Easy and quick, and has a storage compartment to hold the legs for easy transport. Flat, 35 degrees ish, and 70 degrees ish. I wish there was a 90-degree or slightly higher option so it wasn't a constant recline. Overall good for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Skhy Blitzer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty In Pink 💕
customer_reviews.text: Pros:It is so pretty!!!! I’ve had this couch for about two months already and it’s the best decision I’ve made!!!!! It fits perfectly in my Studio Apartment and definitely adds some color Nd and girly-ness to my place. Ever since I’ve added it is literally the highlight of my apartment. CONS: It is suede so be careful I have a pet so probably wasn’t the best idea but couldn’t resist. But my pet hasn’t laid on it or anything (probably doesn’t like it) it is quite low and it’s not something I’ll sleep on directly. If you have guest get a mattress topper.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Love...Love...Love
customer_reviews.text: I love pink it looks exactly like the picture It was so easy all you need to do is screw the legs on the bottom. It's pretty comfortable (as comfortable as you can be on a futon) it goes perfect in my vanity room.
customer_reviews.author: Jamaal

customer_reviews.title: Pretty futon, not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This thing gets dirty easily, and crumbs get stuck in the indentations. It's not very comfy to sit on, but the thing that's most annoying is the middle seam. Who in their right mind would want to sleep on something with a hard middle? If you sit down too fast you could seriously injure your tail bone on the center.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Top

customer_reviews.title: Updated: you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, looks great! can’t beat the price! ... Update.. I bought 2 of these for my theatre room...after a year from 'less than normal' wear, both of these are ready for the garbage! My 2 kids barely use them and All of the springs have gave out on both units, leaving huge sunken dents/craters in the cushions. The corners have also caved in. other than that.. they still function but suck to sit or lay on. Only buy this item if you hate the person that you are buying it for and wish them a truly uncomfortable experience. #Prank #Itsajoke
customer_reviews.author: Theone

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Couch is beautiful for the price and easy to assemble. Unfortunately within two days the little upholstery divots started coming loose, just from sitting on it (which is it's intended use). Now it just looks cheap and if you sit in the middle of it (as you would if you're by yourself) the cushion deforms and looks lumpy. It looked great but definitely will be buying a better futon in the future. If you never intend to sit on it then it's a great buy...
customer_reviews.author: Josh Dutton

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what we needed it for. Very solid and roomy on the inside. We have a million throw blankets and it made the living room look messy. I don’t think it’s very comfy to sit on myself but the cat has barely left it for a week. It’s durable too because I’ve caught her picking at it with her nails and she hasn’t even pulled a thread yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Nice but uncomfortable!!

customer_reviews.author: Cecilia

customer_reviews.title: Cheap thin vinyl

I did not try to send it back so I do not know if the customer service is good or not. The color is as pictured and it will work well for a college student's first apartment. It was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: So Amazingly Uncomfortable!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking futon. Comes exactly as shown. But this has to be, hands down, the most uncomfortable thing I have ever sat on. It's like you are sitting on a metal rod. And forget about using it to sleep on, it's even worse. If I could return it for something more comfortable, I would. Last time I buy any furniture online before trying it out in person first. I would steer clear unless you are just putting in your house for looks.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff F.

customer_reviews.title: Annoying metal clanging!
customer_reviews.text: I have prime so shipping was fast. I was able to get it put together in ten minutes and everything I needed was included. I gave this 2 stars because the part that folds contains a metal piece that rattles and there is no way to fix it without ripping the cushion open. It's cheaper and easier to just keep it since I live in a 3 story walk up.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie G.

customer_reviews.title: Solid product but could be use a bit more cushion ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid product but could be use a bit more cushion. The seam between the seat makes laying down on it a little uncomfortable.
